name: ALT_PRC_DIAGNOSES
description: Diagnoses that are associated with Drug-Disease alerts.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier of the alert record. You could link it to ALERT.ALT_ID to get patient and vendor information in table ALERT.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: PRC_DIAGNOSES_ID
columns.description: This item will have the diagnosis (EDG) IDs that cause this alert to fire.
